meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6836.

div.div: Battle of the Decades semifinal game 1.

td.p: Chuck Forrest, an attorney for the UN IFAD from Marino, Italy
Russ Schumacher, a university professor from Fort Collins, Colorado
Ken Jennings, a writer from Seattle, Washington

tr.td: OCEAN COMMOTION
OLYMPIC ATHLETES BEYOND THE GAMES
GARDENING
GOING OUT OF BUSINESS
BROADWAY & POLITICS
ANAGRAMS FOR MILLIONAIRES
